Reviews.Title: Got this item installed today
Reviews.Author: Doug McCartney
Reviews.Content: I bought mine online from Sam's club for under $500. It pays to shop around. Did extensive research before buying this one. Got it all hooked up today. So far so good. Will update my review after I have used it some.

Reviews.Title: Great system for the price
Reviews.Author: Chris "CS"
Reviews.Content: I originally found this system on the Home Depot site on sale for $309. When I went to order it had gone up to $400 so I ordered here. The 600 TVL cameras provide a more detailed picture than the 480 cameras that come with most low end systems. DVR works great and can be accessed remotely by computer or smart phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy-to-use system functions just like a computer; View anytime, anywhere with remote viewing via internet, smartphone, and tablet
Receive email alerts, with photo, when motion is detected on your property; Record over 2 years' worth of footage on the included 500GB hard drive
Choose motion-activated recording or H.264 compression to maximize storage space; 600TVL Ultra Hi-Res cameras provide crisp and detailed video
36IR LEDs for up to 100ft automatic night vision; Weather-resistant camera housing provides superior functioning through all types of weather
Anti-vandal mount ensures camera cables cannot be tampered with; Easily connect to DVR with 65-foot cables to allow greater flexibility in camera situating
ProductInfo.Name: Defender Connected 8CH H.265 500GB Smart Security DVR with 8 x 600TVL IR Cut Filter 100ft Night Vision Indoor/Outdoor Cameras - 21025
